title: Gate
description:
A pair with gate 1993-135-1, each identical except that gate -1 has handle.  
This gate composed of two sections: a smaller tall rectangular section (positioned at outer right side) and a larger trapezoidal section (that joins with paired gate), the two sections hinged together with two large hinges.  Inside smaller section are 14 cog wheels stacked up irregularly; along the bottom edge a border made up of straight and diagonal lines.  Larger section has radiating pattern of bolts of electricity or lightening and sky-scrapper-like shapes that eminate from lower left inside corner.  Four concentric rings of cogwheel-like form also eminating from lower left inside corner.  Bolts of electricity, cogwheels, spirals, and other shapes intersperced along inside edge.  Bottom edge has a border of stacked coins.
name: Gate
